The 87th Academy Awards ceremony, presented by the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences, will honor the best films of 2014 and will take place Sunday, February 22, 2015, at the Dolby Theatre in Hollywood, Los Angeles.
The Oscars are set for 7 p.m. ET/4 p.m. PT.

The Oscars will be hosted by Neil Patrick Harris.

Chiwetel Ejiofor, Chris Evans, Dakota Johnson, Jennifer Lopez, Chloë Grace Moretz, Eddie Murphy and Margot Robbie will all be presenters.
